
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{ int t;
long long int n,sum,m;
 scanf("%d",&t);
 while(t--)
 { 
   scanf("%lld",&n);
    m=0;
	m=n/2; 
   if(n%2==0)
    { 
      sum= pow(m,2);
      printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
	else
	{ sum=pow(m,2)+m;
	  printf("%lld\n",sum);
	}
    
    
   
 	
 }
	
	
return 0;	
}
